column3: This category gathers together descriptors used for assigning names and types to a place, both at present and historically.
This category is used to gather together information regarding significant descriptions given of a place by known authors/sources.
This category is used to bring together information relevant to the mereo-topological relations between a place and its parts.
This category gathers together information regarding geospatial documentation of the extent of a place.
This category gathers together different descriptors that provide reference information with regards to a place.
